name: Blessed
description: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the roll.
endConditions: The caster is incapacitated or dies
notes: Bless requires Concentration. The bonus applies to all attack rolls and saving throws, including Death Saving Throws. Can target up to 3 creatures; upcasting adds 1 creature per slot level above 1st.
